ReportDefinition.name: Definition
ReportDefinition.Sql: SELECT Computers.Name as "Computer", Applications.Name as "Application", Applications.InstallDate FROM Computers JOIN Applications on Applications.ComputerId = Computers.ComputerId WHERE Applications.InstallDate > date('now', '-14 day') AND Applications.Name NOT IN (SELECT Applications.Name FROM Computers JOIN Applications on Applications.ComputerId = Computers.ComputerId WHERE Applications.InstallDate < date('now', '-14 day') ) AND Applications.Name NOT LIKE "Microsoft Visual C++ % Redistributable%" AND Applications.Name NOT LIKE "Opera%" AND Applications.Name NOT LIKE "Mozilla Thunderbird%" GROUP BY Computers.Name

Report.Description: PDQ Inventory SQL Report query to list applications new to environment in the last 14 days
Report.Name: AppsNewToEnvironment
